SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Fulfillment Order Product Fields

The Fulfillment Order Product object represents a product or delivery charge associated with a fulfillment order. It’s associated with one order product summary.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Fulfillment Order Product object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Adjustments	The total amount of price adjustments applied to the fulfillment order product.
Adjustments Tax	The tax on the adjustments.
Adjustments with Tax	

The total amount, including tax, of the price adjustment applied to the fulfillment order product.

Total Adjustment with Tax = Adjustments + Adjustments Tax


Description	The description of the fulfillment order product.
End Date	The end date of the fulfillment order product.
Fulfillment Order	The fulfillment order associated with the fulfillment order product.
Gross Unit Price	The unit price, including tax, of the fulfillment order product.
Line Subtotal	The price, not including adjustments or tax, of the fulfillment order product.
Line Subtotal Tax	The tax on the line subtotal.
Line Subtotal with Tax	

The price, including tax, of the fulfillment order product.

Line Subtotal with Tax = Line Subtotal + Line Subtotal Tax


Order Product	The original order product for the order product summary associated with the fulfillment order product.
Order Product Summary	The order product summary associated with the fulfillment order product.
Pretax Total	The price, including adjustments but not tax, of the fulfillment order product.
Quantity	The current quantity of the fulfillment order product. This amount is equal to the quantity on the original order minus cancellations.
Quantity on the Original Order	The original quantity of the fulfillment order product.
Quantity Unit of Measure	The unit of measure for the quantity, for example, unit, gallon, ton, or case.
Reship	Indicates whether the fulfillment order product belongs to a reshipment. The default is false.
Reship Reason	

If the fulfillment order product belongs to a reshipment, indicates the reason for the reshipment.

Possible values are:

Damaged
Lost
Unknown
Wrong Item

Start Date	The start date of the fulfillment order product.
Tax	The tax on the pretax total.
Total with Tax	

The total amount, including adjustments and tax, of the fulfillment order product.

Total with Tax = Pretax Total + Tax


Type	

The type of the fulfillment order product. Matches the type of the associated order product summary.

Each type corresponds to one type code, shown here in parentheses.

Possible values are:

Delivery Charge (Charge)—Indicates that the order product summary represents a delivery charge.
Order Product (Product)—Indicates that the order product summary represents any other type of product, service, or charge.

Type Code	

The type code of the fulfillment order product. Matches the type code of the associated order product summary. Processing depends on this value.

Possible values are:

Charge—Indicates that the order product summary represents a delivery charge.
Product—Indicates that the order product summary represents any other type of product, service, or charge.

Each type category corresponds to one or more types.


Unit Price	The unit price of the fulfillment order product.

title: Fulfillment Order Product Fields in Salesforce
